Articles.Content:
Hey all.

I call seeing a list of missions one could do around here somewhere. It was a list of gradually increasing complexity, say first launch an unmanned craft, then a manned craft, then an unmanned craft to Mun, then a manned orbital mission and safe return, then landing on Mun.

Anyone have a list to this missions document or similar list? Thanks....

Short list, there's the Historical Missions on the wiki. A longer list is here (also on the wiki); I'm guessing this is the one you're talking about, since each step in that list consists of multiple missions.
